query:
SELECT id as "id!: i32", 
backer_id as "backer_id!: i32", 
asami_amount as "asami_amount!: Decimal", 
disbursement_id as "disbursement_id!: i32", 
paid as "paid!: bool", 
created_at as "created_at!: UtcDateTime" FROM backer_payouts WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR backer_id = $4::int4) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR asami_amount = $6::decimal) AND (NOT $7::boolean OR disbursement_id = $8::int4) AND (NOT $9::boolean OR paid = $10::boolean) AND (NOT $11::boolean OR created_at = $12::timestamptz) ORDER BY 
      (CASE ($13 = 'Id' AND NOT $14) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($13 = 'Id' AND $14) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($13 = 'BackerId' AND NOT $14) WHEN true THEN backer_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($13 = 'BackerId' AND $14) WHEN true THEN backer_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($13 = 'AsamiAmount' AND NOT $14) WHEN true THEN asami_amount ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($13 = 'AsamiAmount' AND $14) WHEN true THEN asami_amount ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($13 = 'DisbursementId' AND NOT $14) WHEN true THEN disbursement_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($13 = 'DisbursementId' AND $14) WHEN true THEN disbursement_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($13 = 'Paid' AND NOT $14) WHEN true THEN paid ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($13 = 'Paid' AND $14) WHEN true THEN paid ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($13 = 'CreatedAt' AND NOT $14) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($13 = 'CreatedAt' AND $14) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END) DESC
     LIMIT $15 OFFSET $16 FOR UPDATE
